Manoj Joshi’s Look As Amit Shah Is Out & Fans Aren't Convinced, Want Saurabh Shukla Instead!
Manoj Joshi’s Look As Amit Shah Is Out & Fans Aren't Convinced, Want Saurabh Shukla Instead!
After The Accidental Prime Minister, a biopic on Prime Minister Narendra Modi was announced too. When the first look of Vivek Oberoi as PM Narendra Modi for the biopic was revealed, social media went into a frenzy. He looks neither like himself and nor like Narendra Modi, the trolls said.
Also Read: Curious Case Of Too Many Modis! Before Vivek Oberoi & Paresh Rawal, Rajit Kapur Will Play The PM In 'Uri'
this person in the poster neither looks like @narendramodi nor @vivekoberoi — Tapesh Mitra (@Tapeshspeaks) January 7, 2019
The film has been making a buzz ever since. Earlier, it was announced that Manoj Joshi will play the role of Amit Shah, Modi’s closest associate and aide. Now, the first look of the actor in the role has been revealed. He looks unrecognisable. Take a look!
Well-known theatre and film actor Manoj Joshi to portray #AmitShah in #PMNarendraModi... Vivek Anand Oberoi essays the title role... Omung Kumar B directs the biopic... Produced by Suresh Oberoi and Sandip Ssingh... Here's the first look: pic.twitter.com/9M3n78q4XG — taran adarsh (@taran_adarsh) February 13, 2019
But fans think Saurabh Shukla AKA Kallu Mama was a better choice. Here’s how people reacted!
How can someone be better than him? pic.twitter.com/xRyeU6grZe — Chirag Kothari (@ChiragJKothari) February 13, 2019
Don't Miss 776 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
kallu mama Ko le lete pic.twitter.com/rfVWYDnVz5 — . (@PratikTweets_) February 13, 2019
Saurab Shukla would be a great fit for this role — bhavesh Singhvi (@bjain1551) February 13, 2019
Kallu mama looks like amith shah more than amit shah himself — Najeeb (@imnazeeb98) February 13, 2019
Manoj joshi should have played Narendra modii instead — Harshali Jain (@happyharshali) February 13, 2019
“I am glad that I have got an opportunity to play the role of Mr Amit Shah in the film. When Sandeep Ssingh called me to offer this role, I did not think for a second and said yes. This is going to be one of the most interesting characters for me to play,” Manoj Joshi was quoted as saying by IANS.
Twitter
“This was one of the important roles in the film and nobody better than Manoj Joshi could have done it. He is one of the most talented and hardworking actors. It is a great experience working with him,” film's producer Sandip Ssingh said.
